title.label: Would like to see some changes

content.label: I got the editor,but I wish I could do more stuff like change the other teams car to make you op. That is all
Just like all the other Reviews...This game is awesome and Very Fun to Play.  It is one of the few games that is worth every penny spent.
IF YOURE INTO CARS GET THIS GAME. There's quite a lot to it and it's worth getting.

This is one of the best and most realistic car yes I have ever played. Only way to make it better would be of you had a first person camera on the cars as they race.  Also, maybe you could add other types of cars to manage.  Lastly, can you add the ability to send out your own media "posts?"  Love this game, and please consider!

title.label: Just got this game few days ago

content.label: Game is crashing after season one of career mode. Tried 4 times to end season crashed all 4 times

I'm not completely sure, but i think that this is that warm, fuzzy feeling people talk about when they speak of love. I think of it often, if not constantly. I want to buy it flowers everyday after work, and i find myself singing out-loud, swinging around lamp posts in the rain. Is this love? The only fault that i've found so far is that, oddly, it is hard to tell what year/season it is, so i never really know before hand when my drivers' contracts are gonna expire. I've looked everywhere, i think, but cannot find what actual year a particular season is taking place in. Histories of drivers achievements only list their wins and titles, failing to list what year they have occurred in. There are other very awesome details and stats to explore, but no mention of which year it is. Even the season calendar has no year associated with it. Odd. Anyone know where to find such?
Great game, and lot of fun

A game that's easy to pick up and play on the go, yet has real depth in terms of gameplay and features. Phenomenal game.

Just one thing: I'm playing on iPhone 6s and the game crashes when I click the 'end season' button. More precisely, two messages pop up after that (the tweet-like SNS messages) and then the game shuts down. Would rate this five stars if the issue is fixed.

title.label: Won't let me refund an in app purchase

content.label: I've wanted this game as long as it has come out and the game editor was a good thing to have I tried buying it but it won't work so then I try refunding it and repurchasing and it still won't can someone please tell me how to actually get it to work our can you fix that problem it shouldn't be there in the first place

The level of polish and depth is simply amazing for a mobile game. $4 is a steal, would definitely be worth more. I'm not even a racing fan or car person at all but this is just an excellent management game, one of the best I've ever played.

title.label: one of the best games on the app store

content.label: this game is so immersive and so much fun. i play MM1 and was in love with that so when number 2 came out i definitely had to get it. boy i was NOT disappointed one bit. this game is 100x better than the first. i may even go buy the full game from steam now

title.label: Is a must play for Race fans

content.label: This game was a a great improvement to the first edition! The sheer amount of options and variables that you will face is a little confusing at first but turns out to be what makes it great. This game gets you hooked and keeps you trying to improve every aspect. I have finished everything in the game and hope that more will be added to it in the future.
Without a doubt the best racing game available for mobile. Console quality graphics.
And addicting as can be!
Fix that.  Otherwise awesome game.  Shouldn't have bought editor.  Don't want to cheat and its way too easy with it.

Fun game to kill time. I really love the strategies and how you really have to get personal during the career season. Great game. Lots of options to customize. I just wish for 2 things in the future. Maybe a versus mode against friends to test your car against and I know might be a graphical challenge maybe an option to see actual cars instead of dots. But the game isn't a let down at all. Lots of fun. Career mode is a great way to kill time and play anytime you want. Just hope they keep updating the game adding more features in the future.
The first game was amazing and this one is nothing less than an upgrade. Much more in depth and realistic. Has everything the first game didn't.

Game is like a teenager looking at Victoria Secret magazines. Wow!! Can't put it down at first. As you grow up just a lot more to it then just a skimpy magazine. Honeymoon is a lot shorter here. Great game and played it all day for a few weeks but after that just ok.

At first I was worried that the game wouldn't have enough content, and that it cost too much. Now that I've played it for several hours, I know that both of those worries were inaccurate. This game is highly addictive, easily worth the price, and likely the best game on the App Store.

Love this one over the first.  Gives you a ton more flexibility and options.  So much so it took me a good season to figure it all out, sort of.  Only reason I am giving it 4 stars is I can guarantee the game will glitch out as it's trying to save after a race and completely boot me out, making me repeat what I had already done. Happens at least 3 times a season (on season 5 now).  Fix this and I'll give it 5 stars!

Great great game. I think the changes from the PC game are great, the engineering/HQ/parts system is a huge step forward. 

Bugs: I think my weather is backwards- for some reason it ALWAYS rains in Phoenix, but never in Europe. 

Wishlist: More dilemmas. The current ones are great, I'd love one every week to add variety to the game.

I never play mobile games, but when I saw this I bought it instantly. This is a really well done version of MM that is deep enough, but still enjoyable on a phone. Interface and controls work well. Some of the content is a little repetitive, but it's challenging in a good way. I definitely recommend this to any Formula 1 fans. I don't know if I'll play it much after a couple of hours in, but for the price it's worth playing.

title.label: I love this F1 management simulator!!!

content.label:
The moment I came across this app it was love at first sight! - I've drooled over their PC version for a long time but, as a busy single Dad, just couldn't commit the time to it like I wanted 

Then they drop this streamlined iOS app version on me and I was all over it! - easily the best racing sim in the App Store with just the right amount of details to tend to while being challenging and diverse enough to keep me coming back for more (and more and more and moreâ€¦I can't put it down!)

I hope to one day see a GT version as well as an endurance racing version, but, in the meantime, this robust app checks all the right boxes 

Just buy it! - the developer is a quality one and won't let this rot
I got this game over a week ago and I haven't been able to think about anything other that play this game all day, great job to the dev.
The first game was great- this game is even more in depth and the customization options are endless

title.label: Fun, easy to learn hard to master.

content.label: Game gives a new twist on racing games

The amount of items they pulled from the PC is just ridiculous. Graphics are amazing but I wish we could somehow see the actual cars. There also needs to be more safety cars but that is about it. The amount of depth it has is just fantastic. I also wish that we could choose from an existing team and play as them. A team from any series may I add.
Now game crashes every time I try to finish a season... was awesome, now useless. Why do developers always ruin something while fixing things that don't need fixed?

For anyone hesitating on buying this game or not, the answer is yes! Buy this game immedietely. 

MM2 offers huge improvements over the first game. You get more details, you get to customize your car's livery, the aerodynamics, just about anything you could imagine. The game allows you to build up your racers with six different stats to level up, and your cars are the same way. 

My only gripe about the game at the moment is that once you train your drivers and they have really well rounded stats, the amount of money they ask for when it comes time to signing a new contract is a bit too steep. It'd be a little better if they didn't ask for so much, seeing that you are the manager that trained the driver to success. 

Bug note: Every once in awhile, there's a music track that starts playing that overlaps with the main theme song of the in-game menu, and the only way to fix it for a while is to restart the application. It can be a bit bothersome. 

Solid game here, grab it when you can!
This game is so much fun and I don't even know much about racing.

I myself never liked management games but this one takes my cake. I've played this game for about 5 days straight. (I could do that only by YouTube.) This game deserves these 5 stars. I recommend this game to people who play racing game

The game is not as deep as the pc title but it's still a large step up from the already good first game. It's easy to get into and doesn't require any micromanagement, yet you still feel in control of things. Also as a plus there aren't many bugs/glitches, except for one I found.

switching the Asia-Pacific refueling rules to "not allowed" using the game editor still caps the fuel at slightly more than half race distance meaning once that point is reached every team has to finish the race at a crawl.
Nice manager games, i believe that developers will still support the game
I love this game. It is very fun to play. But I would like to see a bit of multiplier on here kind of like a FIFA game.
A fun game. If you liked the first version you'll like this one more - better graphics, more complex, more engaging.

The game improved a million times better  from the first game. They have made it where it is more like the pc app. Maybe later on they can add a feature where people can mods publicly like on Pc or tire allocation in the next few updates.
Such a great game. If you're into management style games, racing, or better yet both, this is a can't miss title. Possibly the best mobile game I've ever played.
I have played over a thousand iPhone games and this game is the best by far.

Arguably the best racing, moreless management simulator out there -- don't be deceived by the price tag, this game is worth every dollar you put into it. 
The game not only keeps you on your toes week in, week out, but keeps you thinking with every decision you make, every deal you sign, every part you build, every firing and hiring that is processed. Words can't describe how much replay ability there is here -- this and the depth which the game goes into with not just part building and driver training, but the opportunity through a dynamic and diversifying environment every week of every season makes for thrilling, addictive gameplay. Highly recommend this to anyone and everyone that stumbles across this. Make no mistake, this is one of, if not the BEST management simulator to EVER hit the App Store.
It's fun

Despite turning the settings off, this app often just plays anyways, either at the same time as my music or even sometimes overriding my music completely. It's incredibly frustrating that the settings can't even do what they say.
I really like this game, but I wish I knew more about some of the stuff going on on-screen that I can't make sense of. Too bad there's no manual to explain everything.
I love this game but when I sign a racer it freezes on the screen when the funds are being taken out. I've tried everything and it won't work
I enjoyed this game. It's fun, pretty graphics and a good level of management. You could easily spend hours on this game and want to play more. Enjoy!
I'm not even a racing fan.  This game is incredibly deep and addicting. Just buy it now.
Need more series and this game would be even better

As a few others have stated, it reaches a point where saved games won't load. This will likely be fixed in the future. 

Copying saved games (before they freeze) is a tedious workaround to consider as there are three saved game slots and a copy/clone feature.

title.label: Amazing, awesome, radical. What you wanted from every port.

content.label: By far the most engaging manager game on iOS. At least two weeks of game play.
This game is so addicting!!' The best game ever! I have never played such a complete and awesome game on my phone. I can't find any cons!

title.label: One of the best games in the app store

content.label: This is the best mobile game i have played on my phone. It's totally worth the money. Why are you reading reviews, just get it and you will love it!
